feed.title: Vanilla Cookbook Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Vanilla Cookbook: v1.0 Vanilla Vanilla
New release for Vanilla Cookbook: v1.1 Vanilla Bean
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/jt196/vanilla-cookbook/compare/v1.0...v1.1

NEW FEATURES

  • AI Scrape assist #225
  • Wrote and updated the docs #215
  • Moving desired features from issues to roadmap.md
  • Tidying up the UI
  • Artwork update #215
  • Adding PNPM to workflow #216
  • Tidying up CICD #218
  • fl oz parse #213
  • UI display when volumetric default (water) has been used) #181
  • Ingredient update/loading spinning disc #180
  • Parsing temperature ranges #220
  • Updated docker installation process in docs

Bug Fixes

  • Fixing shopping item delete #222
  • Unconverted ingredients aren't parsed #179

entry.title: New release for Vanilla Cookbook: v1.1.1 Vanilla Pea
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/jt196/vanilla-cookbook/compare/v1.1...v1.1.1

New Features

  • Added default recipe ingredient checks to options #231
  • Added limited language option to the UI #230
  • When displaying Original in ingredients, hide the parsed version #232
  • Display the version number in Settings > Options #234
  • Ignore docs folder in Docker build - added .dockerignore file

Bug Fixing

  • Other photos section was displaying the main photo, I've fixed the logic here #235
  • If no photo selected as main, fallback to the first returned by id #236

entry.title: New release for Vanilla Cookbook: v1.1.2 Vanilla Edamame
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/jt196/vanilla-cookbook/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

  • Added some new languages to ingredient parser #233
    • Arabic
    • German
    • Spanish
    • French
    • Hindi
    • Indonesian
    • Italian
    • Portuguese
    • Russian
  • Improved the docs
  • Improved the PWA #183 - Sharing to Android app enabled for text and URLs
  • Added AI text parsing #240
  • Added AI image parsing #243
  • Improved registration and login feedback #26
  • Admin page bug fixes and improvements #246 #247 #248 #257
  • Some ingredient parsing work #93
  • Bug fix user logout fix #253
  • Improving initial seeding experience #255 #260
    • adding dummy recipes
    • admin user create from GUI
